item.title: Dynamic Connectivity: Quick-Find
item.description: Let’s assume our object can be identified by an integer number, we can use an integer Array as data structure for our solution (id[]) . In Quick-Find weÂ consider two sites p and q are in the same component if id[p] is equal do id[q]. The initQuickFindUF function allocates the zeroed array and assign the slice that refers to that array to Elements; then go through it and set the value corresponding to each index ( *Elements[i] = i *).
